p:
By substituting one pack out of two with organic waste-based packaging, net saving of about 43 MTOE of virgin oil based resources is expected on average by 2050 at European level and more than 150 MTOE on a global level. These savings represent an absolute reduction of GHG emissions of 120 million tons of CO 2-eq
12 at EU level and 500 million tons of CO 2-eq worldwide (direct CO 2 emissions only).
